concept-wr.title: The Global Alarm Banner
concept-wr.shortdesc: The Titanium Server web administration interface provides an active alarm counts banner in the page header at the top right of all screens.

conbody.p: The global alarm banner can be seen only by users with admin privileges.
The global alarm banner provides a color-coded snapshot of current active alarm counts for each alarm severity.

note.p: Suppressed alarms are not shown. For more about suppressed alarms, see .

conbody.p: Clicking on the alarm banner opens the Fault Management page, where more detailed information about the alarms is provided.
